questions.question: Bihar was separated from Bengal in which year?
questions.explanation: Bihar was separated from Bengal in 1912.

questions.question: What is the capital of Bihar?
questions.explanation: Patna is the capital and largest city of Bihar.

questions.question: Who is known as the 'Father of the Indian Constitution'?
questions.explanation: Dr. B. R. Ambedkar was the chief architect of the Indian Constitution.

questions.question: Which river is known as the lifeline of Bihar?
questions.explanation: The Ganga River is the most important river in Bihar.

questions.question: Nalanda University was established during which dynasty?
questions.explanation: Nalanda University was established during the Gupta dynasty.

questions.question: Which festival is famous in Bihar for women’s fasting for family prosperity?
questions.explanation: Chhath Puja is an ancient Hindu festival celebrated mainly in Bihar.

questions.question: Who was the first President of India?
questions.explanation: Dr. Rajendra Prasad, from Bihar, was the first President of India.

questions.question: Which city in Bihar is famous for silk production?
questions.explanation: Bhagalpur is known as the 'Silk City' of Bihar.

questions.question: Vikramshila University was built by which ruler?
questions.explanation: Vikramshila University was founded by King Dharampala of the Pala dynasty.

questions.question: Which wildlife sanctuary in Bihar is famous for tigers?
questions.explanation: Valmiki Tiger Reserve is the only tiger reserve in Bihar.

questions.question: What is 12 + 8?
questions.explanation: 12 plus 8 equals 20.

questions.question: What is the square of 15?
If a rectangle has length 10 and width 5, what is its area?
questions.explanation: Area of rectangle = length × width = 10 × 5 = 50.

questions.question: What is 100 ÷ 4?
questions.explanation: 100 divided by 4 equals 25.

questions.question: What is the average of 10, 20, and 30?
questions.explanation: Sum = 60, divide by 3 = 20.

questions.question: What is 9²?
What is the perimeter of a square with side 6?
questions.explanation: Perimeter = 4 × side = 24.

questions.question: What is 45% of 200?
If x = 2, what is 3x + 5?
Who is known as the Iron Man of India?
questions.explanation: Sardar Vallabhbhai Patel was called the Iron Man for unifying India.

questions.question: Find the odd one out: Apple, Banana, Mango, Carrot
questions.explanation: Carrot is a vegetable, others are fruits.

questions.question: If CAT is coded as DBU, then DOG is coded as?
questions.explanation: Each letter is shifted +1: D→E, O→P, G→H.

questions.question: Which number comes next: 2, 4, 8, 16, ?
questions.explanation: Each term is doubled.

questions.question: What will be opposite to North-East?
questions.explanation: Opposite direction of NE is SW.

questions.question: If A = 1, B = 2, then Z = ?
questions.explanation: Z is the 26th letter in the alphabet.

questions.question: Find the missing term: 5, 10, 20, ?, 80
questions.explanation: Each term is multiplied by 2.

questions.question: Choose related pair: Book : Author :: Painting : ?
questions.explanation: Book is created by Author, Painting is created by Painter.

questions.question: What is the next letter in the sequence: A, C, E, G, ?
questions.explanation: Skipping one letter each time: A(+2)C(+2)E(+2)G(+2)I.

questions.question: Mirror image of EAST will look like?
questions.explanation: Mirror reverses the order: EAST → TSAE.

questions.question: ‘रामचरितमानस’ के रचयिता कौन हैं?
questions.explanation: रामचरितमानस गोस्वामी तुलसीदास द्वारा रचित है।

questions.question: ‘मेघदूत’ किसने लिखा?
questions.explanation: मेघदूत महाकवि कालिदास की रचना है।

questions.question: ‘सरस्वती’ किसकी देवी हैं?
questions.explanation: सरस्वती ज्ञान और विद्या की देवी मानी जाती हैं।

questions.question: ‘अकबरनामा’ किसने लिखा?
questions.explanation: अकबरनामा अबुल फजल द्वारा लिखा गया।

questions.question: ‘पंचतंत्र’ की रचना किसने की?
questions.explanation: पंचतंत्र की रचना विष्णु शर्मा ने की।

questions.question: ‘गोदान’ उपन्यास के लेखक कौन हैं?
questions.explanation: गोदान प्रेमचंद का प्रसिद्ध उपन्यास है।

questions.question: ‘रश्मिरथी’ किसकी रचना है?
questions.explanation: रश्मिरथी रामधारी सिंह दिनकर की रचना है।

questions.question: ‘जन गण मन’ के रचयिता कौन हैं?
questions.explanation: भारत का राष्ट्रगान रवींद्रनाथ टैगोर ने लिखा।

questions.question: ‘कामायनी’ किसकी रचना है?
questions.explanation: कामायनी महाकवि जयशंकर प्रसाद की रचना है।

questions.question: ‘मधुशाला’ किस कवि की रचना है?
questions.explanation: मधुशाला हरिवंश राय बच्चन की प्रसिद्ध काव्य रचना है।
